channel.title: ArkScape 317 [Economy/Dedicated]
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Q2Fr7aC.png[/img]
[I]Hello to everybody and welcome to this brand new server called ArkScape. This is an Economy server hosted 24/7, where you will be able to train ALL of your skills at a decent exp rate, PK or kill some of the many bosses of the server. ArkScape has 3 game modes for you: Normal, Deadman and Ironman, which many special features for each of those.[/I]
[B]DOWNLOAD CLIENT:[/B] [URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/download/r0l352lwp7d6nbi/Play+ArkScape.rar"]HERE[/URL] [B]OFFICIAL FORUMS:[/B] [URL=http://"www.arkscape.tk"]HERE[/URL]
[U][B]Some of the unique features of the Server:[/B][/U] -Ironman mode -Deadman mode -Great membership benefits -Completionist (with colour changing) and max cape -Tutorial island (Can be skipped) -Quests -Duel arena -Nightmare Zone -Level points -Factions -Prestiging -Amazing pking -Buy 100, sell 100 -All skills are trainable even with a new custom dungeon skill -Pk points and pk point store. -Titles -Proper item effects such as Spirit Shields, including all special attacks! -Gold scrolls -Craftable high-tier armor/weapons -Single players dungeons / 20+ man raids -Money vault -Achievements with even an achievement cape! -Bosses with unique attacks and special features -Boss slayer tasks and more! -Daily quests to complete
[B][U]Some Screenshots:[/U][/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/HskoOq1.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/22Vcgie.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/rObdQkG.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jTHU7Ej.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OjwCKez.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/J4ZhTY4.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1lZ3sSk.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jc0orkY.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Hg4IEpz.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/KJHBwQJ.png[/img]
Hope to see you in-game!

item.title: ArkScape 317 [Economy/Dedicated]
item.dc:creator: @facundo facundo
item.description:
@facundo wrote:

Hello to everybody and welcome to this brand new server called ArkScape. This is an Economy server hosted 24/7, where you will be able to train ALL of your skills at a decent exp rate, PK or kill some of the many bosses of the server. ArkScape has 3 game modes for you: Normal, Deadman and Ironman, which many special features for each of those.

DOWNLOAD CLIENT: HERE
OFFICIAL FORUMS: HERE

Some of the unique features of the Server:
-Ironman mode
-Deadman mode
-Great membership benefits
-Completionist (with colour changing) and max cape
-Tutorial island (Can be skipped)
-Quests
-Duel arena
-Nightmare Zone
-Level points
-Factions
-Prestiging
-Amazing pking
-Buy 100, sell 100
-All skills are trainable even with a new custom dungeon skill
-Pk points and pk point store.
-Titles
-Proper item effects such as Spirit Shields, including all special attacks!
-Gold scrolls
-Craftable high-tier armor/weapons
-Single players dungeons / 20+ man raids
-Money vault
-Achievements with even an achievement cape!
-Bosses with unique attacks and special features
-Boss slayer tasks and more!
-Daily quests to complete

Some Screenshots:

Hope to see you in-game!
